feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Flag off the agent sidebar. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16131
  • Make pod termination grace period configurable. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16134
  • New automation error state: timed_out. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16141
  • Update to node 22 by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15038
  • Update node image usage to 22 by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16146
  • Fix query parameter binding when passing a 0, it shouldn't fall back to the default value. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16147
  • Design updates by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16136

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.6...3.10.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Protect against group.roles being undefined on the user details page. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16150
  • Update node usage in bb/couchdb image by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16151

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.7...3.11.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix flake in generic-sql.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16155
  • Fixing AI table generation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16158

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.11.0...3.11.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.11.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Project apps feature flag by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16145
  • Filter pill buttons are now resizable by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16106
  • Automation SMTP markdown support by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16103
  • adds onDestroy handler for auto refresh Data Prov by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16159
  • Barcode QRcode by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16015
  • adds new pill to Barcode/QR Generator by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16163
  • Move from Source Sans Pro to variable weight Source Sans 3 by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16090
  • Rename project app to workspace app by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16164
  • New project apps backend crud by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16129
  • Rename workspace to tenant by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16166
  • Always fetch a new presigned url for attachments by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16165

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.11.1...3.11.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prepends Datasource to tables and views in App Actions by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16175
  • New screen flow as modal by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16139
  • Fix for automation snippets by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16188
  • Font tweaks by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16186
  • Move screen creation to sdk by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16177
  • Remove workspaceApps from appPackage response by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16193
  • Bump prettier to latest and reformat code by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16189
  • Manage navigation on the backend by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16190
  • Enable JS and table AI generation to self-hosters by default by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16201

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.11.2...3.12.0
